title: Tesla Reports Record Quarter Despite Production Challenges
summary: Tesla delivered record quarterly results despite ongoing supply chain disruptions and production challenges at its new factories.

title: Apple Unveils Next-Generation AI Features for iOS
summary: Apple announced a suite of AI-powered features coming to iOS 18, signaling the company's increased focus on artificial intelligence.

title: Meta's VR Headset Sales Surpass Expectations
summary: Meta's latest VR headset has exceeded sales projections, boosting the company's position in the growing virtual reality market.

title: Microsoft Cloud Services See 30% Growth, Beating Analyst Estimates
summary: Microsoft's cloud division reported 30% year-over-year growth, surpassing Wall Street expectations and driving the stock to new heights.

title: Amazon Expands Same-Day Delivery to 100 New Markets
summary: Amazon announced the expansion of its same-day delivery service to 100 additional markets, intensifying competition in the e-commerce space.

title: Google's AI Search Features Rolling Out Globally
summary: Google is expanding its AI-powered search features to all markets, marking a significant evolution in how users interact with the world's largest search engine.

title: Fed Signals Potential Rate Cut in Coming Months
summary: Federal Reserve officials hinted at a possible interest rate cut in the near future as inflation shows signs of moderating.

title: Chip Shortage Easing, Semiconductor Stocks Rally
summary: The global semiconductor shortage is showing signs of improvement, leading to a rally in chip stocks as supply chain constraints begin to ease.

title: Global Markets React to Lower-Than-Expected Inflation Data
summary: Stock markets worldwide responded positively to inflation data that came in below analysts' forecasts, potentially signaling an end to the rate-hiking cycle.

title: Netflix Subscriber Growth Accelerates in Asian Markets
summary: Netflix reported stronger-than-expected subscriber additions, primarily driven by rapid growth in Asian markets and successful new content releases.
